result.title: Design Option Paper
result.description: By the end of the RBM project, a Design Options Paper will be delivered, identifying and documenting the implementation options, guidelines and implementation alternatives that the partners in the challenge have experienced and would recommend to an agency which is interested in implementing the proposed better practice. Besides the delivery of the DOP, during the last phase of the project and far beyond, the partnership will focus on the transfer of the results obtained during the activities and the transfer of the good practices detected, in each participating region, using their own resources.
